nodes.title: Feature/183 refactor abstract http servlet

Fixed improper Jackson annotations version.
Add support for operationName that was not implemented
Specification updates
Servlet API downgrade, correction in groupId and made some service references optional
Omit mutation object when there are no mutations
Fix a pair of NPEs in doGet
Fix spelling
